select count(*) from memb_store ms left outer join memb m on ms.msno=m.mno where ms.msno=#{value}

select ms.msno, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.chck, m.mgr, ms.crno, ms.cachk, ms.cname, ms.ctype, ms.pst_no, ms.bas_adr, ms.det_adr, ms.map_loc, ms.detail, ms.minfo, ms.notice from memb_store ms left outer join memb m on ms.msno=m.mno

select ms.msno, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.chck, m.mgr, ms.crno, ms.cachk, ms.cname, ms.ctype, ms.pst_no, ms.bas_adr, ms.det_adr, ms.map_loc, ms.detail, ms.minfo, ms.notice from memb_store ms left outer join memb m on ms.msno=m.mno where ms.cname like concat('%',#{value}%,'%')

select ms.msno, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.chck, m.mgr, ms.crno, ms.cachk, ms.cname, ms.ctype, ms.pst_no, ms.bas_adr, ms.det_adr, ms.map_loc, ms.detail, ms.minfo, ms.notice, mt.mtno, mt.mstel from memb m inner join memb_store ms on ms.msno=m.mno left outer join ms_tel mt on mt.msno=m.mno where m.mno=#{value}

select ms.msno, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.chck, m.mgr, ms.crno, ms.cachk, ms.cname, ms.ctype, ms.pst_no, ms.bas_adr, ms.det_adr, ms.map_loc, ms.detail, ms.minfo, ms.notice from memb_store ms left outer join memb m on ms.msno=m.mno where m.email=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into memb_store(msno, crno, cachk, cname, ctype, pst_no, bas_adr, det_adr, map_loc, detail, minfo, notice) values( #{memberNo}, #{corporateRegistrationNumber}, #{corporateConfirm}, #{corporateName}, #{corporateType}, #{postNumber}, #{baseAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{mapLocation}, #{detail}, #{additionalInfo}, #{notice})
mapper.update: update memb_store ms set ms.msno=#{memberNo}, ms.crno=#{corporateRegistrationNumber}, ms.cachk=#{corporateConfirm}, ms.cname=#{corporateName}, ms.ctype=#{corporateType}, ms.pst_no=#{postNumber}, ms.bas_adr=#{baseAddress}, ms.det_adr=#{detailAddress}, ms.map_loc=#{mapLocation}, ms.detail=#{detail}, ms.minfo=#{additionalInfo}, ms.notice=#{notice} where msno=#{memberNo}
